title: May and Nila
overview: "May and Nila" is a film that delves into love, identity, and reincarnation as May, a butch lesbian delivery girl, and Nila, a talented seamstress, connect and feel a deep bond. Their intertwined story takes us from the present day to the Japanese invasion in the Philippines, where we discover their past lives as Oryang and Maria Clara, two individuals who faced different struggles but shared an enduring love.
